39 WMAdmittance::WMAdmittance() :
40  ConfigManager("Admittance")
41 {
42  // Start the reconfigure server
43  init();
44 
45  // Retrieve joint names configuration
46  aAdmittanceNode.getParam("sara_admittance/joint_names", aJointNames);
47 
48  // Retrieve link names for each joint
49  std::vector<std::string> lLinkNames;
50  for (const std::string& lJointName : aJointNames)
51  {
52  std::vector<std::string> lLinkName;
53  aAdmittanceNode.getParam("sara_admittance/" + lJointName, lLinkName);
54  lLinkNames.emplace_back(std::move(lLinkName[0]));
55  }
56 
57  // Create unique instance of gravity model
58  aGravityModel = std::make_unique<WMGravityModel>(lLinkNames, 7);
59 
60  // Create transfer function
61  char const* lTemp = getenv("HOME");
62  if (lTemp == NULL)
63  {
64  throw std::runtime_error("Couldn't retrieve environment variable HOME");
65  }
66  else
67  {
68  // Create transfer function
69  aDiscreteTF = std::make_unique<DiscreteTransferFunction>(
70  std::string(lTemp) + "/sara_ws/src/wm_admittance/config/filter_admittance.yaml");
71  }
72 
73  // Initialize public admittance velocity
74  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
75  {
76  aAdmittanceVelocityMap.emplace(lJointName, 0.0f);
77  }
78 
79  // Subscribe to the joint_state to obtain current efforts applied on joints
80  aJointStateSub = aAdmittanceNode.subscribe("joint_states", 1, &WMAdmittance::jointStateCallback, this);
81 }
82 
87 WMAdmittance* WMAdmittance::getInstance()
88 {
89  WMAdmittance* lInstance = aInstance.load(std::memory_order_acquire);
90  if (!lInstance)
91  {
92  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lLock(aMutex);
93  lInstance = aInstance.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
94  if(!lInstance)
95  {
96  lInstance = new WMAdmittance();
97  aInstance.store(lInstance, std::memory_order_release);
98  }
99  }
100  return lInstance;
101 }
102 
108 double WMAdmittance::getAdmittanceVelocityFromJoint(const std::string& pJointName) const
109 {
110  double lVelocity = 0.0f;
111  const auto& lIter = aAdmittanceVelocityMap.find(pJointName);
112  if (lIter != aAdmittanceVelocityMap.end())
113  {
114  lVelocity = lIter->second;
115  }
116  return lVelocity;
117 }
118 
125 void WMAdmittance::process()
126 {
127  if (isAdmittanceEnabled())
128  {
129  std::vector<double> lAdmittanceTorque =
130  calculateAdmittanceTorque(aGravityModel->process());
131 
132  updateAdmittanceVelocity(
133  aDiscreteTF->updateVector(Eigen::Map<Eigen::VectorXd>(lAdmittanceTorque.data(), lAdmittanceTorque.size())));
134 
135  if (aVerboseMode)
136  {
137  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
138  {
139  ROS_INFO("Velocity of %s: %lf", lJointName.c_str(), getAdmittanceVelocityFromJoint(lJointName));
140  }
141  }
142  }
143 }
144 
152 void WMAdmittance::onDynamicReconfigureChange(const AdmittanceConfig& pConfig)
153 {
154  aEnableAdmittance = pConfig.enableAdmittance;
155  aVerboseMode = pConfig.verboseMode;
156 }

193 void WMAdmittance::jointStateCallback(const sensor_msgs::JointState& pMsg)
194 {
195  if (!aFirstCheck)
196  {
197  aFirstCheck = true;
198  for (const auto& lMapItem : aAdmittanceVelocityMap)
199  {
200  bool lJointNamePresent = false;
201  for (const auto& lJointName : pMsg.name)
202  {
203  if (lMapItem.first == lJointName)
204  {
205  lJointNamePresent = true;
206  break;
207  }
208  }
209 
210  if (!lJointNamePresent)
211  {
212  ROS_ERROR("WMAdmittance: Joint '%s' is not present in topic /joint_states.", lMapItem.first.c_str());
213  throw std::runtime_error("WMAdmittance: Joint '" + lMapItem.first + "' is not present in topic /joint_states.");
214  }
215  }
216  }
217  else
218  {
219  aJointState = pMsg;
220  }
221 }
222 
227 void WMAdmittance::updateAdmittanceVelocity(const std::vector<double>& pAdmittanceVelocity)
228 {
229  size_t lIndex = 0;
230  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
231  {
232  aAdmittanceVelocityMap[lJointName] = pAdmittanceVelocity[lIndex];
233  ++lIndex;
234  }
235 }
236 
242 std::vector<double> WMAdmittance::calculateAdmittanceTorque(const std::vector<double>& pCompensatedTorque)
243 {
244  size_t lIndex = 0;
245  std::vector<double> lAdmittanceTorque;
246  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointNames)
247  {
248  lAdmittanceTorque.emplace_back(getEffortFromJoint(lJointName) - pCompensatedTorque[lIndex]);
249  ++lIndex;
250  }
251  return lAdmittanceTorque;
252 }
253 
259 double WMAdmittance::getEffortFromJoint(const std::string& pJointName) const
260 {
261  size_t lIndex = 0;
262  double lEffort = 0.0f;
263  for (const auto& lJointName : aJointState.name)
264  {
265  if (lJointName == pJointName)
266  {
267  lEffort = aJointState.effort[lIndex];
268  break;
269  }
270  ++lIndex;
271  }
272 }
